function.name: cmd_controller_execute
function.description: Executes a system-level command using os.system() on Windows operating systems. It can execute single or multiple commands chained with '&&'. Note that the provided function is in Python 3 syntax.

command.description: The system command to be executed. To execute multiple commands, separate them with '&&'. For example, 'dir && echo done'.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the command execution time, such as 'seconds' or 'milliseconds'
